                <div class="sub_nav support_nav">    <div class="support-mega-header">    <div class="support-header-left">    <h2>Need some help?</h2>        </div>           <div class="support-header-right">    <div>  <a href="https://secure.shawdirect.ca/english/contact-us/customer-chat/" class="button3"><span class="left"> </span><span class="mid">Click to chat</span><span     $(document).ready(function () {
        window.ShawHeader.initMenu('#56e8f5dd-9d25-4c19-b3bf-3c03e3096fd8');

    <div id="main" class="container_28 clearfix">

            <div class="full_width grid_28">
                    <div>
    <div>
     <style>
	.errorpage {
		background:url(http://media.shawdirect.ca/uploadedimages/shawdirect/pages/error/hero.jpg) right top no-repeat;
		height: 500px;
		padding-left:10px;
		margin-top:20px;
	}
	.errorpage h1 {
		font-family: "shaw-n7","shaw",arial,sans-serif;
		font-weight: 700;
		font-style: normal;
		font-size: 30px;
		padding-top:50px;
		margin:0 0 28px 0;
	}
	.errorpage h2 {
		font-family: "shaw-n4","shaw",arial,sans-serif;
		font-weight: 400;
		font-style: normal;
		font-size: 20px;
		margin-bottom:30px;
	}
	.errorpage p {
		font-size: 15px;
	}
	.errorpage a {
		font-size: 15px;
	}
</style>
<div class="errorpage">
	<h1>Whoops!</h1>

	<h2>Our satellite worker bot can't find the <br />page you're looking for.</h2>

	<p>You can use the menus above to navigate to our<br /> products and services, or you can contact us via <a href="https://www.shawdirect.ca/english/contact-us/" onclick="_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Browse-EN', '404', 'Email']);" data-value="browse|english|404|email" data-event="content-element">email</a> <br />or using our <a href="https://secure.shawdirect.ca/english/contact-us/customer-chat/" onclick="_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Browse-EN', '404', 'Online Chat']);" data-value="browse|english|404|online-chat" data-event="content-element">online chat</a>.</p>

	<h1>Oups!</h1>
	
	<h2>Notre robot préposé au service par satellite <br />ne trouve pas la page que vous cherchez.</h2>

	<p>Vous pouvez utiliser les menus ci-dessus pour <br />parcourir nos produits et services ou communiquer <br />avec nous par <a href="https://www.shawdirect.ca/francais/coordonnees/" onclick="_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Browse-FR', '404', 'Email']);" data-value="browse|francais|404|email" data-event="content-element">courriel</a> ou <a href="https://secure.shawdirect.ca/francais/coordonnees/clavardage/" onclick="_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Browse-FR', '404', 'Online Chat']);" data-value="browse|francais|404|online-chat" data-event="content-element">clavardage</a>.</p>
</div>

<script>
	$(document).ready(function() {
		var referrer =  document.referrer;
		_gaq.push(['_trackEvent', 'Browse-EN', '404', referrer]);
	});
</script>
    </div>
</div>


            </div>

            

    </div>

            <div class="full_width">

<!--MC#803-->
<div id="SimplifiedBuyFlow">
	<a href="#" class="cancel">&nbsp;</a>
	<div class="newCx">
		<h3>I'm new to Shaw Direct</h3>
		<div class="CxChoice">
			<div>
				<span>You've selected:</span>
				<div class="CxChoicePkg"></div>
				<div class="CxChoiceSubText"></div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="CxChoicePrice price-bug">
			<div class="price">
				<span class="dollar-sign">$</span>
				<span class="dollar-value"></span>
				<span class="decimal-value"></span>
				<span class="per"></span>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="clearfix"></div>
		<a href="#" class="button1 continueMyOrder">
			<span class="left"></span><span class="mid">Continue My Order &nbsp;</span><span class="right"></span>
		</a>
	</div>

	<div class="curCx">
		<h3>I'm already a Shaw Direct Customer</h3>
		<p>As a current Shaw Direct customer, you can make changes to your account by<br/>signing into My Account</p>
		<a href="#" class="button7 signIn">
			<span class="left"></span><span class="mid">Sign-In to My Account &nbsp;</span><span class="right"></span>
		</a>
	</div>
</div>
<div id="SimplifiedBuyFlowCover"></div>
<script type="text/javascript">
    var SBFModal = {
        config: {
            'wrapper': '#SimplifiedBuyFlow',
            'isFrench': false,
            'continueOrderUrl': '',
            'signInUrl': ''
        },
        init: function (config) {
            this.initConfig();
            this.loadProduct(config);
        },
        buildModal: function () {
            this.config.continueOrderUrl += '?pkgid=' + this.config.id;
            var wrapper = $(this.config.wrapper);

            $(wrapper).find('.CxChoicePkg').html(this.config.title);
            this.buildPrice(".CxChoicePrice");

            $(wrapper).find('.CxChoiceSubText').html(this.buildPoints());

            $(wrapper).find('.continueMyOrder').prop("href", this.config.continueOrderUrl);
            $(wrapper).find('.signIn').prop("href", this.config.signInUrl);

            $('#SimplifiedBuyFlow, #SimplifiedBuyFlow + #SimplifiedBuyFlowCover')
                .css({ "display": "block" })
                .filter('#SimplifiedBuyFlow').css({ "position": "fixed", "top": "150px", "left": ($("body").width() / 2) - ($('#SimplifiedBuyFlow').width() / 2) });
        },
        initConfig: function () {
            this.config.isFrench = $('body').hasClass("Francais");
            this.config.continueOrderUrl = this.config.isFrench ? '/commander/' : '/order/';
            this.config.signInUrl = this.config.isFrench ? 'https://secure.shawdirect.ca/francais/mon-compte/' : 'https://secure.shawdirect.ca/english/my-account/';
            this.setLanguageText();
        },
        buildPoints: function () {
            if ('' == this.config.detailLeft) {
                this.config.detailLeft = '<ul></ul>';
            }
            var p = $(this.config.detailLeft);
            var bulletCount = $(p).find('li').length;
            for (; bulletCount > 3; bulletCount--) {
                $(p).find('li:last-child').remove();
            }
            $(p).css('padding-top', 25.5 - (8.5 * bulletCount)); // ul height/2-(li height /2) * items
            return p;
        },
        setLanguageText: function () {
            if (!this.config.isFrench) return;
            var wrapper = $(this.config.wrapper);
            $(wrapper).find(".newCx h3").text("Je suis un nouveau client de Shaw Direct");
            $(wrapper).find(".CxChoice span").text("Vous avez choisi :");
            $(wrapper).find(".continueMyOrder .mid").html("Poursuivre ma commande &nbsp;");
            $(wrapper).find(".curCx h3").html("Je suis d&eacute;j&agrave; client de Shaw Direct");
            $(wrapper).find(".curCx p").html("&Agrave; titre de client de Shaw Direct, vous pouvez apporter des changements &agrave; votre compte en ouvrant une session dans Mon compte.");
            $(wrapper).find(".signIn .mid").html("Se connecter &agrave; Mon compte &nbsp;");
        },
        buildPrice: function (priceTarget) {
            pObj = this.sanitizePrice(this.config.price);

            var priceHtml = $(priceTarget);
            $(priceHtml).find('.dollar-value').text(pObj.dollarValue);
            $(priceHtml).find('.decimal-value').html(pObj.decimalValue);
            if (pObj.per) {
                $(priceHtml).find('.per').text(this.config.isFrench ? 'par mois' : 'MO');
            } else {
                $(priceHtml).find('.per').text('');
            }
            return priceHtml;
        },
        sanitizePrice: function (price) {
            var priceObj = { "per": false, "dollarValue": "", "decimalValue": "", "price": "" };

            if ('MO' === price.trim().slice(-2) || 'par mois' === price.trim().slice(-8)) {
                priceObj.per = true;
            }
            priceObj.price = price.replace("/", "").toLowerCase().replace("par mois", "").replace("mo", "").replace(",", "").replace("$", "").trim();
            priceObj.dollarValue = this.getDollars(priceObj.price);
            priceObj.decimalValue = this.getFrenchCents(priceObj.price);
            return priceObj;
        },
        getDollars: function (v) {
            return Math.floor(v);
        },
        getFrenchCents: function (v) {
            var decimalValue = v.slice(-2);
            if (this.config.isFrench) {
                decimalValue += ' <span class="francais-dollar-sign">$</span>'
            }
            return decimalValue;
        },
        loadProduct: function (id) {
            var path = location.pathname.toLowerCase(),
                language = (/francais/.test(path) || /commander/.test(path)) ? 'fr' : 'en';
            var param = { 'id': id, 'lang': language };
            $.getJSON('/api/products/get', param)
            .done(function (data) {
                $.extend(SBFModal.config, data);
                SBFModal.buildModal();
            })
            .fail(function (jqxhr, textStatus, error) {
                var catalogFake = [{ "id": 2147483661, "type": "Hardware", "title": "Essential HD Receiver", "name": "Essential HD Receiver", "description": "See sharper images, hear clearer sound, and watch On-Demand content with Shaw Direct's Essential HD receiver.", "detailLeft": "<ul><li>Get clearer picture</li><li>14-day on-screen guide</li><li>Set parental controls</li><li>HD, SD &amp; 3D ready</li><li>Create smart reminders</li><li>Set favourites</li></ul>", "detailMain": "<p>Some Features include:</p><ul><li>Essential HD Receiver</li><li>Satellite dish installation</li><li>2 free pay-per-view or on-demand movies</li></ul>", "price": "$99.99", "discount": "-100 hardware credit", "offerPrice": "$0.00", "thumbnailLarge": "", "thumbnailSmall": "", "detailImage": "", "custom1": "", "custom2": "", "order": "2" }, { "id": 4294969649, "type": "Package", "title": "Digital Favourites", "name": "Digital Favourites", "description": "Get our most popular package including English and HD Essentials and tons of specialty channels. ", "detailLeft": "<ul><li>Up to 253 channels</li><li>Up to 42 in HD</li></ul>", "detailMain": "<b>MISSING</b>", "price": "$72.99/MO", "discount": "First month free", "offerPrice": "$0.00", "thumbnailLarge": "", "thumbnailSmall": "", "detailImage": "", "custom1": "", "custom2": "", "order": "1" }, { "id": 4294969648, "type": "Hardware", "title": "Advanced HDPVR", "name": "Advanced HDPVR ", "description": "Build a collection of your favourite TV shows. Pause, rewind and record live TV.", "detailLeft": "<ul><li>Get clearer picture</li><li>14-day on-screen guide</li><li>Set parental controls</li><li>HD, SD &amp; 3D ready</li><li>Create smart reminders</li><li>Set favourites</li></ul>", "detailMain": "<p>Some Features include:</p><ul><li>Advanced HDPVR Receiver</li><li>Satellite dish installation</li><li>2 free pay-per-view or on-demand movies</li></ul>", "price": "$249.99", "discount": "-100 hardware credit", "offerPrice": "$149.99", "thumbnailLarge": "", "thumbnailSmall": "", "detailImage": "", "custom1": "", "custom2": "", "order": "1" }, { "id": 4294969651, "type": "Package", "title": "Ultimate", "name": "Ultimate", "description": "The name says it all. Enjoy English and HD Essentials with ALL the bundles. It's the largest starting package that Shaw Direct has to offer.", "detailLeft": "<ul><li>Up to 303 channels </li><li>Up to 4 in HD </li><li>All 13 bundles </li></ul>", "detailMain": "", "price": "$103.99/MO", "discount": "$70 credit on first month", "offerPrice": "$33.99", "thumbnailLarge": "", "thumbnailSmall": "", "detailImage": "", "custom1": "", "custom2": "", "order": "2" }, { "id": 4294969647, "type": "SBFProduct", "title": "Essential HD Receiver", "name": "Essential HD Receiver", "description": "See sharper images, hear clearer sound, and watch On-Demand content with Shaw Direct's Essential HD receiver.", "detailLeft": "<ul><li>Get clearer picture</li><li>14-day on-screen guide</li><li>Set parental controls</li><li>HD, SD &amp; 3D ready</li><li>Create smart reminders</li><li>Set favourites</li></ul>", "detailMain": "<p>Some Features include:</p><ul><li>Essential HD Receiver</li><li>Satellite dish installation</li><li>2 free pay-per-view or on-demand movies</li></ul>", "price": "$99.99", "discount": "-100 hardware credit", "offerPrice": "$0.00", "thumbnailLarge": "", "thumbnailSmall": "", "detailImage": "", "custom1": "", "custom2": "", "order": "2" }, { "id": 4294969652, "type": "Package", "title": "Digital lite", "name": "Digital lite", "description": "Meets the entertainment needs of the light TV watcher at a low monthly price. Includes popular Canadian and US networks.", "detailLeft": "<ul><li>Up to 127 channels</li><li>Up to 24 in HD </li></ul>", "detailMain": "", "price": "$39.99/MO", "discount": "First month free", "offerPrice": "$0.00", "thumbnailLarge": "", "thumbnailSmall": "", "detailImage": "", "custom1": "", "custom2": "", "order": "3" }, { "custom1": "", "custom2": "", "description": "Feast your eyes on the hottest Hollywood movies, premiering every Friday and Saturday on The Movie Network, plus get exclusive access to every episode of every season of the hottest HBO\u00ae Canada series on Shaw On Demand. With three movie channels, two HBO\u00ae channels, Action, AMC and four U.S. Superstations, you won\u2019t miss a thing. Available to viewers east of the Ontario/Manitoba border.", "detailImage": "", "detailLeft": "", "detailMain": "", "discount": "Price may be lower with certain TV packages", "id": 4294969686, "name": "The Movie Network", "offerPrice": "", "order": "", "price": "$19.99/MO ", "thumbnailLarge": "", "thumbnailSmall": "", "title": "The Movie Network", "type": "SBFProduct" }, ];
                for (var item in catalogFake) {
                    if (catalogFake[item].id == id) {
                        $.extend(SBFModal.config, catalogFake[item]);
                        break;
                    }
                }
                SBFModal.buildModal();
            });
        }
    }


    $(document).ready(function () {

        $(".SimpleOrder").click(function (a) {
            a.preventDefault();
            SBFModal.init($(this).data("sbf"));
        });
        $(document).on('click', ".SimpleOrderHref", function (a) {
            a.preventDefault();
            SBFModal.init($(this).attr('href').slice(1));
        });
        $("#SimplifiedBuyFlow a.cancel").click(function (a) {
            $('#SimplifiedBuyFlow, #SimplifiedBuyFlow + #SimplifiedBuyFlowCover').css("display", "none");
            a.preventDefault();
        });

    });

</script>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>	      


     <script type="text/javascript">
         $(document).ready(function () {
             ShawGlobal.init();
         });
     </script>




        </div>
        
         <script type="text/javascript">
             (function (a, b, c, d) {
                 a = '//tags.tiqcdn.com/utag/shaw/shaw-direct/prod/utag.js';
                 b = document; c = 'script'; d = b.createElement(c); d.src = a; d.type = 'text/java' + c; d.async = true;
                 a = b.getElementsByTagName(c)[0]; a.parentNode.insertBefore(d, a);
             })();
         </script>

        <script type="text/javascript">
    var _gaq = _gaq || [];
    _gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-6191386-2']);
    _gaq.push(['_setDomainName', 'shawdirect.ca']);
    _gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);
    (function () {
        var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true; ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js'; var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s); }
    )();
</script>



        
    
    

<script type="text/javascript">
    ShawGlobal.urlEnglish = '';
    ShawGlobal.urlFrench = '';
     
</script>

    </body>
</html>
